main event: An unidentified flying object was reported in Ubon, Thailand on 8 June 1962.
interesting points: The object was described by witnesses as being 'like a large yellow sun.', The sighting was known to U.S. Air Force personnel stationed at the USAF Radar Detachment., No conclusions were reached in the investigation, and there is no case in the file., Requests for additional information from Far East sources received no replies., A request for information was made by a former U.S. Army personnel who was interested in UFOs.
sighted object: unidentified flying object resembling a large yellow sun
witness description: Witnesses included U.S. Air Force personnel at the USAF Radar Detachment.
